Mesmer.name: Psychic Instability
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, cause knockdown for ', 2...4...4, ' seconds on target foe and all nearby foes. ', 50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.

Mesmer.name: Psychic Instability (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: if the action is a skill, causes knockdown for ', 2...3...3, ' seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes. ', 50% failure chance unless Fast Casting 5 or higher.

Mesmer.name: Recurring Insecurity
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -', 1...4...5, ' Health degeneration. Renewal: if target foe has another hex when Recurring Insecurity would end.'

Mesmer.name: Revealed Enchantment
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effects: you gain ', 3...13...15, ' Energy; this spell is replaced with that enchantment (20 seconds).'

Mesmer.name: Revealed Hex
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effects: you gain ', 4...9...10, ' Energy; this spell is replaced with that hex (20 seconds).'

Mesmer.name: Shame
Mesmer.description: "Hex Spell. (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal ", 5...12...14, ' Energy. ', No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.

Mesmer.name: Shared Burden
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 50% slower.'

Mesmer.name: Shared Burden (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes near your target (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). These foes attack, cast spells, and move 33% slower.'

Mesmer.name: Shatter Delusions
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: ', 15...63...75, ' damage to target and all adjacent foes.'

Mesmer.name: Shatter Delusions (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Removes a Mesmer hex from target foe. Removal effect: ', 15...63...75, ' damage to target and all adjacent foes.'

Mesmer.name: Shatter Enchantment
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals ', 14...83...100, ' damage.'

Mesmer.name: Shatter Hex
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals ', 30...102...120, ' damage to foes near this ally.'

Mesmer.name: Shatter Storm
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Spell. Removes all enchantments. ', Removal cost: Shatter Storm is disabled for +7 seconds for each enchantment removed.

Mesmer.name: Shrinking Armor
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Causes -', 1...3...4, ' Health degeneration. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (', 5...17...20, ' seconds).'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Clumsiness
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals ', 15...51...60, ' damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Clumsiness (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Interrupts an attack for target foe and all adjacent foes. Interruption effect: deals ', 15...51...60, ' damage; knocks down foes using attack skills.'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Disenchantment
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Removes one enchantment. ', You lose all Energy.

Mesmer.name: Signet of Disruption
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Interrupts a spell. Can interrupt any skill if target foe is hexed. Interruption effect: deals ', 10...43...51, ' damage.'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Distraction
Mesmer.description: "Signet. Interrupts a spell. Interruption effect: target foe's spell is disabled for ", 1...4...5, ' seconds for each signet you have equipped.'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Humility
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Disables elite skill (', 1...13...16, ' seconds). ', Disables your non-Mesmer skills (10 seconds).

Mesmer.name: Signet of Illusions
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Signet. Your next ', 1...3...3, ' spells use your Illusion attribute instead of its normal attribute.'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Midnight
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Touch Signet. (15 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition. ', You suffer from Blindness (15 seconds).

Mesmer.name: Signet of Recall
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. (10 seconds.) You have -4 Energy regeneration. End effect: you gain ', 13...19...20, ' Energy.'

Mesmer.name: Signet of Weariness
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Also affects foes near your target. Causes ', 3...7...8, ' Energy loss and inflicts Weakness (', 1...10...12, ' seconds).'

Mesmer.name: Simple Thievery
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Spell. Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: If a skill was interrupted, that skill is disabled and Simple Thievery becomes that skill (', 5...17...20, ' seconds).'

Mesmer.name: Soothing Images
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. Also hexes foe adjacent to target. (', 8...18...20, ' seconds). These foes cannot gain adrenaline.'

Mesmer.name: Spirit Shackles
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (', 5...17...20, '). Target foe loses 5 Energy whenever it attacks.'

Mesmer.name: Spirit of Failure
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Target foe has 25% chance to miss. You gain ', 1...3...3, ' Energy whenever this foe misses.'

Mesmer.name: Spiritual Pain
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 15...63...75, ' damage. Deals ', 25...105...125, ' damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.'

Mesmer.name: Spiritual Pain (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...33...40, ' damage. Deals ', 25...105...125, ' damage to hostile summoned creatures in the area of your target foe.'

Mesmer.name: Stolen Speed
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes (', 1...8...10, ' seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells cast by you or your allies have -50% casting times.'

Mesmer.name: Stolen Speed (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes adjacent foes (', 1...8...10, ' seconds). Doubles spell casting time. Spells you cast on hexed foes have -50% casting time.'

Mesmer.name: Sum of All Fears
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (', 1...8...10, ' seconds.) Target foe moves, attacks, and casts spells 33% slower.'

Mesmer.name: Symbolic Celerity
Mesmer.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 36...55...60, ' seconds.) Your signets use your Fast Casting attribute.'

Mesmer.name: Symbolic Posture
Mesmer.description: 'Stance. (', 5...17...20, ' seconds.) Your next signet recharges ', 20...68...80, '% faster.'

Mesmer.name: Symbols of Inspiration
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Skill. (', 1...25...31, ' seconds.) This skill becomes the Elite of target foe. Elite spells you cast use your Fast Casting attribute instead of their normal attributes.'

Mesmer.name: Sympathetic Visage
Mesmer.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 4...9...10, ' seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.'

Mesmer.name: Tease
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Spell. Interrupts a skill. Interruption effect: also interrupts other foes in the area, and you steal ', 0...4...5, ' Energy from all foes in the area.'

Mesmer.name: Time Ward
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Ward Spell. (', 3...13...15, ' seconds.) Allies in this ward cast spells ', 15...19...20, '% faster and recharge skills ', 15...19...20, '% faster. ', Allied spirits are not affected. PvE Skill

Mesmer.name: Unnatural Signet
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Deals ', 15...63...75, ' damage. Deals ', 5...41...50, ' damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted.'

Mesmer.name: Unnatural Signet (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Signet. Deals ', 10...50...60, ' damage. Deals ', 10...50...60, ' damage to other adjacent foes if the target is hexed or enchanted. ', Your non-Mesmer skills except signets are disabled (10 seconds).

Mesmer.name: Visions of Regret
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take ', 15...39...45, ' damage whenever they use a skill and ', 5...41...50, ' additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.'

Mesmer.name: Visions of Regret (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (10 seconds). These foes take ', 10...26...30, ' damage whenever they use a skill and ', 5...33...40, ' additional damage if not under the effects of another Mesmer hex.'

Mesmer.name: Wandering Eye
Mesmer.description: "Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: ", 30...94...110, ' damage to nearby foes.'

Mesmer.name: Wandering Eye (PvP)
Mesmer.description: "Hex Spell. (4 seconds.) Interrupts target foe's next attack. Interruption effect: ", 10...76...92, ' damage to nearby foes.'

Mesmer.name: Waste Not, Want Not
Mesmer.description: 'Spell. You gain ', 8...12...13, ' Energy if target foe is not attacking or casting a spell.'

Mesmer.name: Wastrel's Demise
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Each second while hexed, target foe and all foes adjacent to that foe take ', 1...8...10, ' damage. Foes take +', 1...8...10, ' damage each second this hex is in effect. ', Ends early if target foe uses a skill.

Mesmer.name: Wastrel's Worry
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (3 seconds). End effect: causes ', 20...84...100, ' damage to target and adjacent foes. ', No effect and ends early if target foe uses a skill.

Mesmer.name: Web of Disruption
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.'

Mesmer.name: Web of Disruption (PvP)
Mesmer.description: 'Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.'

Elementalist.name: Aftershock
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 26...85...100, ' earth damage to nearby foes. Deals ', 10...56...68, ' more earth damage to knocked down foes.'

Elementalist.name: Air Attunement
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 36...55...60, ' seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost whenever you use an Air Magic skill.'

Elementalist.name: Arc Lightning
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...33...40, ' lightning damage. Deals ', 15...71...85, ' lightning damage to two nearby foes if you are Overcast. 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Armor of Earth
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) You have +', 24...53...60, ' armor. You move ', 50...21...14, '% slower.'

Elementalist.name: Armor of Frost
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 10...29...34, ' seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.'

Elementalist.name: Armor of Mist
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 8...18...20, ' seconds.) You have +', 10...34...40, ' armor and move 33% faster.'

Elementalist.name: Ash Blast
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Deals ', 35...59...65, ' earth damage. Burning foes are hexed for 5 seconds and miss ', 20...64...75, '% of attacks. Also strikes adjacent.'

Elementalist.name: Aura of Restoration
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain ', 0...1...1, ' Energy and are healed for ', 200...440...500, '% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.'

Elementalist.name: Aura of Restoration (PvP)
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) You gain ', 0...1...1, ' Energy and are healed for ', 200...360...400, '% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.'

Elementalist.name: Bed of Coals
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...24...29, ' fire damage each second (5 seconds) to location of target foe. Hits foes adjacent to your target. Inflicts Burning condition (', 3...6...7, ' seconds) on knocked down foes.'

Elementalist.name: Blinding Flash
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Inflicts Blindness condition (', 3...7...8, ' seconds).'

Elementalist.name: Blinding Surge
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Spell. Deals ', 5...41...50, ' lightning damage. Inflicts Blindness condition (', 3...7...8, ' seconds) on target and adjacent foes. 25% armor penetration. If target was attacking, also hits adjacent foes and deals 50% more damage.'

Elementalist.name: Blurred Vision
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (', 4...9...10, ' seconds). They have 50% chance to miss.'

Elementalist.name: Breath of Fire
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...34...40, " fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location."

Elementalist.name: Burning Speed
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) You move ', 30...42...45, '% faster. ', You suffer from Burning (7 seconds)., ' End effect: inflicts Burning condition (', 3...8...9, ' seconds) on adjacent foes.'

Elementalist.name: Chain Lightning
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...70...85, ' lightning damage. Also hits two foes near your target. 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Chilling Winds
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) The next water hex on target foe lasts ', 25...85...100, '% longer. Initial effect: ', 30...54...60, ' cold damage. Also strikes adjacent.'

Elementalist.name: Churning Earth
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...34...40, " earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Causes knock-down to foes moving faster than normal."

Elementalist.name: Conjure Flame
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +', 5...17...20, ' fire damage. ', No effect unless your weapon deals fire damage.

Elementalist.name: Conjure Frost
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +', 5...17...20, ' cold damage. ', No effect unless your weapon deals cold damage.

Elementalist.name: Conjure Lightning
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your attacks hit for +', 5...17...20, ' lightning damage. ', No effect unless your weapon deals lightning damage.

Elementalist.name: Crystal Wave
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...58...70, ' damage to all foes adjacent to you. Those foes lose all conditions and take ', 5...13...15, ' damage for each condition removed.'

Elementalist.name: Deep Freeze
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Also hexes foes in the area of your target (10 seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals ', 10...70...85, ' cold damage.'

Elementalist.name: Double Dragon
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Enchants you and target ally. Adjacent foes take ', 5...25...30, ' fire damage each second. Skills that target a foe also inflict Burning (', 0...2...3, ' seconds).'

Elementalist.name: Dragon's Stomp
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 26...85...100, ' earth damage. Causes knock-down. Also hits foes near this foe.'

Elementalist.name: Earth Attunement
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 36...55...60, ' seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use an Earth Magic skill.'

Elementalist.name: Earthen Shackles
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) Target and nearby foes move 90% slower. Applies Weakness for ', 5...17...20, ' seconds when it ends.'

Elementalist.name: Earthquake
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 26...85...100, ' earth damage. Also hits foes near target. Causes knock-down.'

Elementalist.name: Ebon Hawk
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 10...70...85, ' earth damage and inflicts Weakness condition (', 5...13...15, ' seconds).'

Elementalist.name: Elemental Attunement
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 25...53...60, ' seconds.) Your elemental attributes are increased by +', 1...2...2, '. You gain 50% of the Energy cost of any Air, Earth, Fire, and Water Magic skills you use.'

Elementalist.name: Elemental Flame
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 10...30...35, ' seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (', 1...4...5, ' seconds) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a ', target, '.'

Elementalist.name: Elemental Flame (PvP)
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 5...17...20, ' seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (', 1...2...2, ' seconds) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a ', target, '.'

Elementalist.name: Elemental Lord
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 40...60, ' seconds.) Your elemental attributes are boosted by 1. Each time you cast a spell, you gain 1 energy for every 10 ranks of Energy Storage and are healed for ', 100...300, "% of the spell's Energy cost."

Elementalist.name: Energy Blast
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 1...2...2, ' damage (maximum 130) for each point of Energy you have.'

Elementalist.name: Energy Boon
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 36...55...60, ' seconds.) Maximum Health for you and target ally is increased by ', 1...3...3, ' for each point of maximum Energy. Initial effect: Both gain ', 1...10...12, ' Energy. You gain +1 Energy for every 2 points of Energy Storage.'

Elementalist.name: Enervating Charge
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 25...45...50, ' lightning damage. Inflicts Weakness condition (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Eruption
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...34...40, " earth damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes near target's initial location. Inflicts Blindness condition (10 seconds)."

Elementalist.name: Ether Prism
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Skill. (3 seconds.) All damage you take is reduced by 75%. End effect: gain ', 5...17...20, ' Energy.'

Elementalist.name: Ether Prodigy
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 8...18...20, ' seconds.) You have +6 Energy regeneration. End effect: lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have. ', Lose all enchantments.

Elementalist.name: Ether Renewal
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 5...17...20, ' seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain ', 1...3...4, ' Energy and ', 5...17...20, ' Health for each enchantment on you.'

Elementalist.name: Ether Renewal (PvP)
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (7 seconds.) Each time you cast a spell, you gain ', 1...3...3, ' Energy and ', 5...17...20, ' Health for each enchantment on you.'

Elementalist.name: Fire Attunement
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 36...55...60, ' seconds.) You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the Energy cost when you use a Fire Magic skill.'

Elementalist.name: Fire Storm
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...29...35, " fire damage each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location."

Elementalist.name: Fireball
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 7...91...112, ' fire damage to target and adjacent foes.'

Elementalist.name: Flame Burst
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 15...99...120, ' fire damage to all foes near you.'

Elementalist.name: Flame Djinn's Haste
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 8...13...14, ' seconds.) You move 25% faster. Initial effect: deals ', 15...99...120, ' fire damage to foes adjacent to you. If you damage a foe with this spell, it recharges 50% faster.'

Elementalist.name: Flare
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 20...56...65, ' fire damage. If Overcast, strikes adjacent.'

Elementalist.name: Freezing Gust
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Deals ', 20...68...80, ' cold damage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic. Otherwise, this foe moves 66% slower (', 1...4...5, ' seconds).'

Elementalist.name: Frigid Armor
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 10...22...25, ' seconds.) You have +', 10...34...40, ' armor against physical damage and immunity to Burning.'

Elementalist.name: Frozen Burst
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Hexes foes near you. These foes move 66% slower (', 3...7...8, ' seconds). Initial effect: deals ', 10...70...85, ' cold damage to foes near you.'

Elementalist.name: Gale
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Causes knock-down. ', 50% failure chance unless Air Magic 5 or more.

Elementalist.name: Glimmering Mark
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Deals ', 5...21...25, ' damage each second to target and adjacent foes. Inflicts Blindness ', sic, ' on foes using attack skills. ', Ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.

Elementalist.name: Glowing Gaze
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...41...50, ' fire damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Burning.'

Elementalist.name: Glowing Ice
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...41...50, ' cold damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is hexed with Water Magic.'

Elementalist.name: Glowstone
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 5...41...50, ' earth damage. You gain 5 Energy plus 1 Energy for every 2 ranks of Energy Storage if target foe is Weakened.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Concentration
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and is unaffected by the Dazed condition.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Elemental Power
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (25 seconds.) Boosts your elemental attributes by +2 for your next 10 spells.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Energy
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Glyph. Your next ', 1...3...3, ' spells does not cause Overcast and costs ', 10...22...25, ' less Energy. Gain ', 1...2...2, ' to all elemental attributes.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Essence
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly. ', You lose all Energy.

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Immolation
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next ', 1...3...4, ' spells that targets a foe also inflicts Burning condition (', 1...3...4, ' seconds).'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells cost ', 10...16...18, ' less Energy.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Renewal
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell recharges instantly.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Restoration
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next 2 spells heal you for ', 30...90...105, ', and you are healed for ', 150...350...400, '% of the Energy cost of each spell.'

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Sacrifice
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next spell casts instantly but takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. ', Ends if you use a non-spell skill.

Elementalist.name: Glyph of Swiftness
Elementalist.description: 'Glyph. (15 seconds.) Your next ', 1...4...5, ' spells recharge 25% faster and projectiles from them move 200% faster.'

Elementalist.name: Grasping Earth
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Hexes foes near you for (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). These foes move 50% slower.'

Elementalist.name: Gust
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 5...10...11, ' seconds.) You and target ally move 33% faster. Initial effect: Foes near you and target ally are struck for ', 15...59...70, ' cold damage. Attacking or moving foes are knocked down.'

Elementalist.name: Ice Prison
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. (', 8...18...20, ' seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower.'

Elementalist.name: Ice Spear
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. Projectile: deals ', 10...50...60, ' cold damage. Gain +', 1...3...4, ' Health regeneration for 5 seconds if Overcast.'

Elementalist.name: Ice Spikes
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (', 2...5...6, ' seconds). These foes move 66% slower. Initial effect: deals ', 20...68...80, ' cold damage.'

Elementalist.name: Icy Prism
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 15...63...75, ' cold damage. Deals +', sic, 15...63...75, ' cold damage to other nearby foes if target has a Water Magic hex.'

Elementalist.name: Icy Shackles
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Hex Spell. (', 1...8...10, ' seconds.) Target foe moves 66% slower. This foe moves 90% slower if enchanted.'

Elementalist.name: Immolate
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 20...64...75, ' fire damage. Inflicts Burning condition (', 1...3...3, ' seconds).'

Elementalist.name: Incendiary Bonds
Elementalist.description: 'Hex Spell. (3 seconds.) End effect: deals ', 20...68...80, ' fire damage and inflicts Burning condition (', 1...3...3, ' seconds) to foes near your target. Also triggers if foe dies.'

Elementalist.name: Inferno
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 30...114...135, ' fire damage to foes adjacent to you.'

Elementalist.name: Intensity
Elementalist.description: 'Skill. (10 seconds.) The next time you deal elemental damage with a spell, other targets in the area take ', 60...70, '% of that damage.'

Elementalist.name: Invoke Lightning
Elementalist.description: 'Elite Spell. Deals ', 10...74...90, ' lightning damage. Hits two foes near target. 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Iron Mist
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (', 8...14...15, ' seconds.) Gain +15 armor. Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.'

Elementalist.name: Kinetic Armor
Elementalist.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) You have +', 20...68...80, ' armor. Renewal bonus: cast a spell.'

Elementalist.name: Lava Arrows
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 20...56...65, ' fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.'

Elementalist.name: Lava Font
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 5...41...50, ' fire damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location. If Overcast, range increased to nearby.'

Elementalist.name: Lightning Bolt
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 5...41...50, ' lightning damage. Deals ', 5...41...50, ' more lightning damage if target foe is moving. 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Lightning Hammer
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...82...100, ' lightning damage. Applies Cracked Armor (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Lightning Hammer (PvP)
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Deals ', 10...82...100, ' lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.'

Elementalist.name: Lightning Javelin
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: Deals ', 15...43...50, ' lightning damage. Interrupts if your target is attacking. 25% armor penetration. Strikes all foes between you and your target.'

Elementalist.name: Lightning Orb
Elementalist.description: 'Spell. Projectile: deals ', 10...82...100, ' lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.'

Dervish.name: Radiant Scythe
Dervish.description: 'Scythe Attack. Deals +1 damage (maximum ', 5...25...30, ') for each point of Energy you have. Gain ', 1...6...7, ' Energy.'

Dervish.name: Reap Impurities
Dervish.description: 'Melee Attack. Deals +', 3...13...15, ' damage. Struck foes lose 1 condition. ', Removal Effect, ': all foes adjacent to those struck take ', 10...34...40, ' holy damage.'

Dervish.name: Reaper's Sweep
Dervish.description: 'Elite Scythe Attack. (', 3...13...15, ' seconds.) Cause Cripple. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: cause knockdown for ', 2...3...3, ' seconds.'

Dervish.name: Rending Aura
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attack skills remove enchantments from knocked-down foes. Initial effect: deals ', 10...34...40, ' cold damage to all nearby foes. End effect: nearby foes have Cracked Armor for ', 1...8...10, ' seconds.'

Dervish.name: Rending Sweep
Dervish.description: 'Scythe Attack. Deals +', 5...17...20, ' damage. You lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: struck foes lose an enchantment.'

Dervish.name: Rending Touch
Dervish.description: Touch, ' Spell. Deals ', 15...55...65, ' cold damage. Lose 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: target foe loses 1 enchantment and you gain 1 strike of adrenaline.'

Dervish.name: Sand Shards
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Deal ', 10...50...60, ' earth damage to all other adjacent foes whenever you hit with your scythe. ', Ends after 1...4...5 hits.

Dervish.name: Shield of Force
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (', 1...13...16, ' seconds.) Blocks the next 1 attack against you. Knocks down and inflicts Weakness (', 5...17...20, ' seconds) on all adjacent attacking foes.'

Dervish.name: Signet of Mystic Speed
Dervish.description: 'Signet. (30 seconds.) Your next ', 1...3...3, ' self-targeted enchantments ', sic, ' cast instantly. ', Flash enchantments do not consume uses of this skill.

Dervish.name: Signet of Pious Light
Dervish.description: 'Signet. Heals for ', 30...126...150, '. Removes one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.'

Dervish.name: Signet of Pious Restraint
Dervish.description: 'Signet. Inflicts Crippled condition (', 5...13...15, ' seconds). Remove one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: also causes Cripple to foes nearby your target and recharges 75% faster.'

Dervish.name: Signet of Pious Restraint (PvP)
Dervish.description: 'Signet. (', 5...13...15, ' seconds.) Cripples target foe and removes 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: recharges 75% faster.'

Dervish.name: Staggering Force
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals ', 10...34...40, ' earth damage to nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Cracked Armor condition (', 1...8...10, ' seconds) on nearby foes.'

Dervish.name: Test of Faith
Dervish.description: 'Touch Spell. Deals ', 15...55...65, ' cold damage and removes 1 enchantment. Target foe is Dazed for ', 1...3...4, ' seconds if that foe was not enchanted.'

Dervish.name: Twin Moon Sweep
Dervish.description: 'Melee Attack. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain ', 10...42...50, ' Health. Removal effect: unblockable, ', attack, ' twice, and gain ', 10...58...70, ' more Health.'

Dervish.name: Twin Moon Sweep (PvP)
Dervish.description: 'Melee Attack. Remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Gain ', 10...18...20, ' Health. Removal effect: Unblockable, attack twice, each strike doing 25% less damage, and gain ', 10...26...30, ' more Health.'

Dervish.name: Veil of Thorns
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (', 5...21...25, ' seconds.) Spell damage is reduced by ', 5...29...35, '%. Initial Effect: nearby foes are struck for ', 5...41...50, ' piercing damage.'

Dervish.name: Victorious Sweep
Dervish.description: 'Melee Attack. Deals +', 5...21...25, ' damage. You gain ', 30...70...80, ' Health for each foe you hit that has less Health than you.'

Dervish.name: Vital Boon
Dervish.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You have +', 40...88...100, ' maximum Health. End effect: Heals you for ', 75...175...200, '.'

Dervish.name: Vow of Piety
Dervish.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds) +24 armor and +', 1...3...4, ' Health regeneration. Renewal: Whenever an enchantment on you ends.'

Dervish.name: Vow of Revolution
Dervish.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 3...9...10, ' seconds.) Gain +', 1...4...5, ' energy regeneration. Renewal: whenever you use a non-Dervish skill. ', PvE Skill

Dervish.name: Vow of Silence
Dervish.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (', 5...9...10, ' seconds.) Spells cannot target you. ', You cannot cast spells.

Dervish.name: Vow of Strength
Dervish.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (15 seconds.) When you attack with a scythe, deals ', 10...22...25, ' slashing damage to adjacent foes.'

Dervish.name: Watchful Intervention
Dervish.description: 'Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Heals for ', 50...170...200, " the next time damage drops target ally's Health below 25%."

Dervish.name: Wearying Strike
Dervish.description: 'Scythe Attack. Remove 1 Dervish Enchantment. Removal Effect: Inflicts Deep Wound condition (', 3...9...10, ' seconds). ', You are Weakened (10 seconds) if an enchantment is not lost.

Dervish.name: Whirling Charge
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (', 1...5...6, ' seconds.) You move 33% faster. Deal ', 10...50...60, ' cold damage to all other nearby foes the next time you hit a foe and this enchantment ends.'

Dervish.name: Winds of Disenchantment
Dervish.description: 'Spell. Remove one of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: all nearby foes lose 1 enchantment and take ', 20...68...80, ' cold damage.'

Dervish.name: Wounding Strike
Dervish.description: 'Elite Scythe Attack. Deals +', 5...17...20, ' damage and inflicts Bleeding condition (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal Effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (', 5...17...20, ' seconds).'

Dervish.name: Wounding Strike (PvP)
Dervish.description: 'Elite Scythe Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (', 5...17...20, ' seconds). Removes 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (', 5...17...20, ' seconds).'

Dervish.name: Zealous Renewal
Dervish.description: 'Flash Enchantment Spell. (', 5...21...25, ' seconds.) Initial effect: deals ', 5...25...30, ' holy damage to nearby foes. You have -1 Energy regeneration and gain 1 Energy when you hit. Gain ', 1...4...5, ' Energy if this enchantment ends early.'

Dervish.name: Zealous Sweep
Dervish.description: 'Scythe Attack. Deals +', 5...17...20, ' damage. You gain 3 Energy and 1 adrenaline for each foe you hit.'

Dervish.name: Zealous Vow
Dervish.description: 'Elite Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You gain ', 1...5...6, ' Energy each time you hit with an attack. ', You have -3 Energy regeneration.

Common.name: Resurrection Signet
Common.description: 'Signet. Resurrects target party member (100% Health, 25% Energy). This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.'
